participant_1.name: Eleanor
participant_1.personality: Eleanor is lively and spirited, with a zest for life that defies her age. She is wise, nostalgic, and possesses a deep appreciation for the simple joys of life, such as dancing and enjoying a good glass of wine.
participant_1.background: i am 100 years old. i love to drink wine and dance in the moonlight. i am very strong for my age. i feel like i might live forever. i remember when nobody had a television.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Liam is introspective and calm, with a serene demeanor that reflects his commitment to spirituality. He values silence and mindfulness, embracing a lifestyle focused on inner peace and self-discovery.
participant_2.background: i quit my job to pursue my spirituality full time. i have not spoken in three months. i live in alaska. i like meditation. i'm a buddhist.
